function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Malnourished children under 5 at higher risk of contracting malaria due to food scarcity and limited access to public health information.","Impact":"Increased spread and severity of malaria in vulnerable populations.","Mitigation":"Implement food assistance programs, improve access to public health information, and prioritize vulnerable households for interventions.","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and data analysis for identifying vulnerable households, mobile health apps for information dissemination.","People":"Children under 5, families in areas with food scarcity, communities with limited access to public health information.","Owner":"Government agencies, NGOs, local community organizations."},{"Description":"Belief in spiritual causes of illness and rejection of proposed modifications to houses for disease prevention.","Impact":"Resistance to public health interventions and modifications to reduce disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Community engagement, education on the causes of illness, involving community leaders in health initiatives.","Technologies":"Virtual reality tools for community education, digital storytelling for sharing health information.","People":"Communities with beliefs in spiritual causes of illness, community leaders, public health educators.","Owner":"Public health organizations, community leaders, educators."},{"Description":"Increased urbanization correlated with increased malaria infections in affected regions.","Impact":"Higher prevalence of malaria in urban areas due to rapid urbanization.","Mitigation":"Urban planning for mosquito control, improved healthcare services in urban areas, and targeted public health campaigns.","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping for mosquito breeding sites, GIS for urban planning, mobile health clinics for urban areas.","People":"Urban populations in malaria-prone regions, urban planners, healthcare workers.","Owner":"City governments, healthcare organizations, urban planners."}]}
